quote-text:
I also like people who love themselves. I don’t trust people who don’t love themselves and tell me “I love you.” No. If they don’t love themselves, not, uh-uh. There is an African saying which is: Be careful when a naked
person offers you a shirt.
quote-source: Maya Angelou, The Distinguished Annie Clark Tanner Lecture, May 8, 1997 (also: Madness #2666)
